snippet: Mike Huckabee, the former Arkansas governor, is starting a talk-radio show that will compete with Rush Limbaugh's, and his focus is getting radio stations to carry it.
abstract: Mike Huckabee, the former Arkansas governor, is starting a talk-radio show that will compete with Rush Limbaugh's, and his focus is getting radio stations to carry it.
lead_paragraph: Mike Huckabee, experienced in the art of wooing voters, will now try to woo radio stations.

headline.main: Huckabee's Latest Campaign Is Aimed at Radio Stations
